common module¶

Module that contains shared utils

The utils are:

Retrieving the IP and mac addresses of the machin we’re running on. Retrieving the IP and mac addresses of our gateway. Holds the magic we use to identify dns massages between the client and the server.

class common.LocalMachine¶

Bases: object

common.running_as_root()¶

Validates that the client/server has root privileges

Returns:

bool: whether we are running as root

common.running_from_script()¶

Validates that the client/server was called from within the run.sh script

Returns:

bool: whether we are running from the script

common.validate_state(logger)¶

Validates that both running_as_root and running_from_script are valid

Returns:

bool: whether both of them are valid

TCP TUNNEL OVER DNS
